alert.note: Alert for Kit Carson County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 2:27PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Brief Landspout Tornadoes Possible... At 226 PM MDT, conditions are becoming favorable for the development of landspout tornadoes in and close to the southern Kit Carson County area. However, at this time it is unknown which if any storm would produce a landspout. Any tornadoes which develop are expected to pose a limited threat. This landspout threat will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Kit Carson County County. Landspout tornadoes can form with a developing thunderstorm before rain, hail, and even thunder is observed. Landspout tornadoes are not usually associated with a wall cloud and are often difficult to detect with weather radar. &&
